titles.title: North Texas Mobility Improvement Act of 2003
To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a project to widen Interstate Route 35 East in Denton County, Texas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/13/2003--Introduced. North Texas Mobility Improvement Act of 2003 - Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a project to widen from 4 to 6 lanes Interstate Route 35 East between Farm-to-Market Road 2181 and Lake Lewisville in Denton County, Texas.
